DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , open-label trial randomize participant multiple myeloma regimen ibandronate zoledronate order compare incidence nephrotoxicity , measure creatinine clearance ( CrCl ) reduction great ( > ) 30 percent ( % ) absolute value 30 milliliter per minute ( mL/min ) low .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Ibandronate - Zoledronate Regarding Nephrotoxicity Multiple Myeloma
DOC.criteria: Confirmed multiple myeloma , Stage IIIII per Salmon Durie ( 1975 ) Indication biphosphonate therapy Previous therapy ibandronate zoledronate within past 12 month Renal insufficiency serum creatinine > 3.0 mg/dL > 265 micromoles per liter ( µmol/L ) CrCl < 30 mL/min Hypersensitivity ibandronate , zoledronate , biphosphonates Presence secondary malignomas , apart basaliomas cervical carcinoma situ Severe accompany illness organ impairment Osteonecrosis jaw start study Life expectancy ≤12 month
